org.apache.flink.storm.api

类 FlinkSubmitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.storm.api.FlinkSubmitter

  • public class FlinkSubmitter
extends java.lang.Object
    FlinkSubmitter mimics a StormSubmitter to submit Storm topologies to a Flink cluster.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  FlinkSubmitter.FlinkProgressListener
      Dummy interface use to track progress of file upload.

    • 方法详细资料

      • submitTopology

        public static void submitTopology(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.util.Map<?,?> stormConf,
                                  FlinkTopology topology,
                                  org.apache.storm.generated.SubmitOptions opts)
                           throws org.apache.storm.generated.AlreadyAliveException,
                                  org.apache.storm.generated.InvalidTopologyException
        Submits a topology to run on the cluster. A topology runs forever or until explicitly killed.
        参数:
        name - the name of the storm.
        stormConf - the topology-specific configuration. See Config.
        topology - the processing to execute.
        opts - to manipulate the starting of the topology.
        抛出:
        org.apache.storm.generated.AlreadyAliveException - if a topology with this name is already running
        org.apache.storm.generated.InvalidTopologyException - if an invalid topology was submitted

      • submitTopology

        public static void submitTopology(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.util.Map stormConf,
                                  FlinkTopology topology)
                           throws org.apache.storm.generated.AlreadyAliveException,
                                  org.apache.storm.generated.InvalidTopologyException
        Submits a topology to run on the cluster. A topology runs forever or until explicitly killed. The given FlinkSubmitter.FlinkProgressListener is ignored because progress bars are not supported by Flink.
        参数:
        name - the name of the storm.
        stormConf - the topology-specific configuration. See Config.
        topology - the processing to execute.
        抛出:
        org.apache.storm.generated.AlreadyAliveException - if a topology with this name is already running
        org.apache.storm.generated.InvalidTopologyException - if an invalid topology was submitted

      • submitTopologyWithProgressBar

        public static void submitTopologyWithProgressBar(java.lang.String name,
                                                 java.util.Map<?,?> stormConf,
                                                 FlinkTopology topology)
                                          throws org.apache.storm.generated.AlreadyAliveException,
                                                 org.apache.storm.generated.InvalidTopologyException
        Same as submitTopology(String, Map, FlinkTopology, SubmitOptions). Progress bars are not supported by Flink.
        参数:
        name - the name of the storm.
        stormConf - the topology-specific configuration. See Config.
        topology - the processing to execute.
        抛出:
        org.apache.storm.generated.AlreadyAliveException - if a topology with this name is already running
        org.apache.storm.generated.InvalidTopologyException - if an invalid topology was submitted

      • submitJar

        public static java.lang.String submitJar(java.util.Map conf,
                                         java.lang.String localJar)
        In Flink, jar files are submitted directly when a program is started. Thus, this method does nothing. The returned value is parameter localJar, because this give the best integration of Storm behavior within a Flink environment.
        参数:
        conf - the topology-specific configuration. See Config.
        localJar - file path of the jar file to submit
        返回:
        the value of parameter localJar

      • submitJar

        public static java.lang.String submitJar(java.lang.String localJar)
        In Flink, jar files are submitted directly when a program is started. Thus, this method does nothing. The returned value is parameter localJar, because this give the best integration of Storm behavior within a Flink environment.
        参数:
        localJar - file path of the jar file to submit
        返回:
        the value of parameter localJar
